summary: Hyperscalers (Microsoft, Google, Meta, AWS) are all aggressively increasing AI infrastructure spending in 2024-2025 Capex guidance, signaling strong demand. Current H100/A100 rental prices remain high ($3.16/hr), indicating sustained demand pressure. Upcoming major model releases (Gemini 2 confirmed 2024, GPT-5 rumored 2025) further drive optimism.
